dc_description_s:
REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. Inner Mongolia Provincial Capital Location and Census Data, 2000 is a point theme representing the capital of Inner Mongolia province in China in 2000.  Attribute information includes population variables from the China 2000 census. 

This data layer is part of the China 2000 Township Census data set produced by the All China Marketing Research Co. and distributed by the University of Michigan, China Data Center.
dc_title_s: Inner Mongolia Provincial Capital Location and Census Data, 2000
